alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 07 at 3:48PM AKST until March 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and high winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. West winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 9 PM Wednesday to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop Wednesday night and continue through Friday morning. The strongest winds and worst conditions are expected on late Wednesday night and Thursday.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
